Posts.EditableText: Is there a way to create a copy of a game (online version), I need to fiddle with the game start script and am not confident that I won't break it in some way!
Posts.HTML: Is there a way to create a copy of a game (online version), I need to fiddle with the game start script and am not confident that I won't break it in some way!

Posts.EditableText: i recommend going into code view copy all code then create new game, go into code view and paste over any code in that new game.
Posts.HTML: i recommend going into code view copy all code then create new game, go into code view and paste over any code in that new game.
